rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with Vastu-compliant orientation, aligning with the positive flow of energy from the west-facing plot.
A spacious living room designed for Mediterranean aesthetics with natural light and a view to the garden. Windows are placed strategically in line with Vastu principles.
A dining area that harmonizes functionality with traditional Mediterranean design, keeping the budget constraints in mind.
A compact and efficient kitchen area incorporating energy-efficient fixtures with Vastu-compliant placement for cooking activities.
